examples: This type of heater uses a lot of electricity.
Some common types of cooking oils include canola oil, vegetable oil, and sunflower oil.
Strawberries and blueberries are my favorite types of berries.
Max is a different type of a person.
Multipolar neurons are the most common type of neuron found in the brain and spinal cord.
words.defineEn: a class or group of people or things that have common characteristics or share particular qualities
words.defineVi: một lớp hoặc nhóm người hoặc vật có đặc điểm chung hoặc chia sẻ những phẩm chất cụ thể

examples: The jury is still out as concerns the location of the new station.
She unfolded the map to find the location of the tourist attractions.
Having 3 locations in the same area creates a situation that the left doesn't know what the right hand is doing.
Whenever a celebrity is spotted in town, fans make a beeline for the location, hoping to catch a glimpse or snap a photo.
I used my finger to point at the map and show them the location.
words.defineEn: the geographic position of someone or something
words.defineVi: vị trí địa lý của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: a residential region like cities, towns, and suburbs that is characterized by high population density
words.defineVi: một khu dân cư như thành phố, thị trấn và vùng ngoại ô được đặc trưng bởi mật độ dân số cao

words.defineEn: an area of land located outside the densely populated urban areas in a city or town
words.defineVi: một diện tích đất nằm bên ngoài các khu đô thị đông dân cư trong một thành phố hoặc thị trấn

examples: My father had a living in an inner suburb of Leeds which had been going down in the world for decades.
Over the weekend, federal agents searched Warner's house in a Nashville suburb.
We begin in the American suburbs.
words.defineEn: a residential area outside a city
words.defineVi: một khu dân cư bên ngoài một thành phố
